izzy.classification¶

Classes¶

GenericModel()

GenericModel class.

LogisticRegression([solver])

The class LogisticRegression fits a logistic regression model

RandomForest(*args, **kwargs)

izzy.classification.metrics¶

accuracy(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the accuracy of the model

aic(log_likelihood, degrees_of_freedom)

Compute the Akaike Information Criteria (AIC)

bic(log_likelihood, degrees_of_freedom, …)

Compute the Bayesian Information Criteria (BIC)

confusion_matrix(y_true, y_pred[, …])

Compute the confusion matrix

f1(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the f1 score

false_negatives(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute false negatives

false_positives(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute false positives

gini(y_true, y_prob[, sample_weights])

Compute the Gini coefficient

ks(y_true, y_prob[, sample_weights])

Compute the Kolmogorov-Smirnov (KS) test statistic to evaluate model performance

performance_report(y_true, y_prob[, …])

A performance report for a model.

precision(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the precision (synonym: positive predictive value)

recall(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the recall (synonyms: sensitivity, hit rate, true positive rate)

roc(y_true, y_prob[, sample_weights])

Compute false positive rates and true positives rates for the receiver operating characteristic

roc_auc(y_true, y_prob[, sample_weights])

Compute the area under the receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve

roc_plot(y_true, y_prob[, sample_weights])

Plot the receiver operating characteristic (ROC)

sensitivity(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the recall (synonyms: sensitivity, hit rate, true positive rate)

specificity(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute the specificity (synonyms: selectivity, true negative rate)

true_negatives(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute true negatives

true_positives(y_true, y_pred[, sample_weights])

Compute true positives
